guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.title: Why are you on the naughty list this year?

body: A quarter of the way into the pandemic, I was loaning money left and right to help out friends and family.  Then I had to stop answering email and the phone.
body_html: A quarter of the way into the pandemic, I was loaning money left and right to help out friends and family. Then I had to stop answering email and the phone.

post.title: Why are you on the naughty list this year?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Envy. For some reason every single person I become friends with turns out to be this super high-achieving gifted person, usually in a lot of areas. I've always had the same aspirations but am not even good at one single thing, and it doesn't matter how many years of practice I put into it, everyone else still starts out 10x better than me with no effort. Basically I'm being selfish in general.
body_html: Envy. For some reason every single person I become friends with turns out to be this super high-achieving gifted person, usually in a lot of areas. I've always had the same aspirations but am not even good at one single thing, and it doesn't matter how many years of practice I put into it, everyone else still starts out 10x better than me with no effort. Basically I'm being selfish in general.

post.title: Why are you on the naughty list this year?

body: Acquiring valuable connections is a useful skill.  You should find a way to leverage it.  Perhaps one of those high-achievers could be a mentor to you?
body_html: Acquiring valuable connections is a useful skill. You should find a way to leverage it. Perhaps one of those high-achievers could be a mentor to you?

body:
I mix the darks and the whites.  
  
I leave the cap off the toothpaste.

I name shared files with ddmmyy convention.

I mix the darks and the whites.

I leave the cap off the toothpaste.

I name shared files with ddmmyy convention.

post.title: Why are you on the naughty list this year?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

body:
I don't want to burden them, and besides it's still the same problem: no matter how much they teach me, I can still only do those exact things I was taught, exactly how I was taught. There's no fluidity or flexibility for me. I just don't have the instinct or flow to do everything naturally like they can, which is absolutely necessary to have even a little independence. I'm hopeless and I almost certainly always will be.

> Acquiring valuable connections is a useful skill.

It hasn't paid off either in my case. Every time someone around here starts another project (often a website), they're all invited but I'm still not. This happened to me a lot before ruqqus too. I think people can tell I'm a mistake even though they wouldn't dare say so. Even if it had helped me, so what? It doesn't change the core problem.
body_html:
I don't want to burden them, and besides it's still the same problem: no matter how much they teach me, I can still only do those exact things I was taught, exactly how I was taught. There's no fluidity or flexibility for me. I just don't have the instinct or flow to do everything naturally like they can, which is absolutely necessary to have even a little independence. I'm hopeless and I almost certainly always will be.

Acquiring valuable connections is a useful skill.

It hasn't paid off either in my case. Every time someone around here starts another project (often a website), they're all invited but I'm still not. This happened to me a lot before ruqqus too. I think people can tell I'm a mistake even though they wouldn't dare say so. Even if it had helped me, so what? It doesn't change the core problem.

post.title: Why are you on the naughty list this year?

body:
Learn to enjoy the learning.  Life gets SO much better when you take the approach on some things that you are gonna suck at things sometimes. But you are gonna have a BLAST learning and doing, and that may helpe position you to be the superstar of the next thing you are brave enough to try.  

This is the confession of being one of those "high achievers"... there is a curse side to it.  You start to feel the pressure of HAVING to high achieve EVERYTHING.  Don't envy, please... it is a secret hell of perfectionism and imposter syndrome.  Life fucking SUCKED until I got the maturity on me to step back and say, "I am going to try X, and I am going to totally suck ass on it, and that is OKAY... it is going to be fun!" I only started living then.
body_html:
Learn to enjoy the learning. Life gets SO much better when you take the approach on some things that you are gonna suck at things sometimes. But you are gonna have a BLAST learning and doing, and that may helpe position you to be the superstar of the next thing you are brave enough to try.

This is the confession of being one of those "high achievers"... there is a curse side to it. You start to feel the pressure of HAVING to high achieve EVERYTHING. Don't envy, please... it is a secret hell of perfectionism and imposter syndrome. Life fucking SUCKED until I got the maturity on me to step back and say, "I am going to try X, and I am going to totally suck ass on it, and that is OKAY... it is going to be fun!" I only started living then.

Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
